title: MultiSig Wallet Deployer
subtitle: Secure and reliable enterprise-grade multi-signature wallet solution

wallet.pleaseConnect: Please connect your wallet to view multi-signature wallet information

deploy.title: Deploy New MultiSig Wallet
deploy.subtitle: Configure and deploy a new multi-signature wallet contract
deploy.shareTip: Click 'Share with Other Owners' to copy the link and send it to wallet B and C owners. They can view this multi-sig wallet and manage transactions after opening the link.
deploy.linkCopied: Shareable link copied! Other owners can view and manage transactions through this link
deploy.percentageTip: Setting to {{percentage}}% means executing transactions requires {{required}} owner confirmations
deploy.instruction1: Ensure all owner addresses are correct
deploy.instruction2: Owners and confirmation requirements cannot be modified after deployment
deploy.networkNotReady: Network not ready, please try again later
deploy.walletInitializing: Wallet connection initializing, please wait a moment and try again
deploy.atLeastOneOwner: Please add at least one owner address
deploy.confirmationsOutOfRange: Required confirmations must be between 1 and the number of owners
deploy.transactionCreationFailed: Transaction creation failed. Please check your wallet balance and network connection.

view.title: View MultiSig Wallet
view.startViewing: Enter Contract Address to Start Viewing
view.inputPrompt: Enter the deployed multi-sig wallet contract address above
view.youAreOwner: You are an owner of this wallet
view.youAreOwnerDesc: You can submit, confirm, and execute multi-sig transactions
view.notOwner: You are not an owner of this wallet
view.notOwnerDesc: You can only view wallet information, cannot perform operations
view.manageDesc: Go to 'Transaction Management' tab to submit new transactions, confirm pending transactions, or execute approved transactions
view.loadFailed: Failed to load contract, please check if the address is correct

transactions.title: Transaction Management
transactions.subtitle: View and manage past transactions and approval records
transactions.startManagement: Enter Contract Address to Start Management
transactions.inputPrompt: Enter the deployed multi-sig wallet contract address above
transactions.notOwner: You are not an owner of this wallet
transactions.notOwnerDesc: Only wallet owners can manage transactions
transactions.pleaseVerifyInfo: Please verify the following information before approving:
transactions.selectOrInputContract: Select or Input MultiSig Wallet Address
transactions.selectContractFirst: Please select a contract wallet first
transactions.revokeTransactionConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this transaction?
transactions.fillAllFields: Please fill in all transfer information
transactions.notOwnerWarning: Current wallet is not an owner of this contract. Cannot initiate transfers.

index.enterpriseSolution: Secure and reliable enterprise-grade multi-signature wallet solution
index.whyChooseSecurityDesc: Requires multiple owners to confirm transactions, effectively preventing single points of failure and fund theft
index.whyChooseManagementDesc: Supports M-of-N multi-sig schemes with flexible confirmation requirements, suitable for teams and organizations
index.whyChooseTransparentDesc: All transaction records are on-chain, fully transparent, and you can view transaction history and confirmation status at any time
index.scenarioCompanyDesc: Multiple partners jointly manage company funds, preventing unauthorized asset transfers by individuals
index.scenarioDAODesc: Community council members jointly manage community funds, enabling democratic decision-making
index.scenarioProjectDesc: Investors and founders jointly manage project funds, providing dual protection to reduce risks
index.scenarioFamilyDesc: Couples jointly manage family assets, with major expenses requiring mutual agreement
index.ctaDesc: Connect your wallet to deploy or manage your multi-sig wallet. Supports 14+ major blockchain networks, secure and reliable, easy to use.
index.workflowStep1Desc: Set multiple owner addresses and required confirmations (e.g., 2/3 means 2 confirmations out of 3 owners)
index.workflowStep2Desc: Any owner can submit a transaction, which will enter a pending confirmation state
index.workflowStep3Desc: Other owners review and confirm the transaction. When the required number of confirmations is reached, the transaction can be executed
index.workflowStep4Desc: After reaching the required confirmations, the blockchain automatically executes the transaction and securely transfers funds
index.workflowStep5Desc: After the transaction is successful, all relevant stakeholders will receive email notifications of the execution result
index.workflowCompletionMessage: All stakeholders have received email notifications

deployedContracts.title: My Deployed MultiSig Wallets
deployedContracts.subtitle: View and manage all your deployed multi-signature wallet contracts
deployedContracts.noContractsDesc: After deploying your first multi-sig wallet contract, it will appear here
deployedContracts.switchNetwork: Please switch to the network where this contract is deployed to view details
deployedContracts.switchNetworkForTransfer: This contract is deployed on {{network}}. You need to switch networks to initiate a transfer. Switch now?
deployedContracts.manualQueryDesc: Enter contract address or transaction hash to query and view MultiSig wallet details
deployedContracts.addContractDesc: Enter contract address or deployment transaction hash, the system will automatically verify and add it
deployedContracts.enterAddressOrTx: Enter contract address or transaction hash (0x...)
deployedContracts.invalidInput: Please enter a valid contract address or transaction hash
deployedContracts.txNotFound: Transaction not found or not a contract creation
deployedContracts.notMultiSig: This address is not a valid MultiSig wallet contract
deployedContracts.alreadyExists: This contract already exists in the list

transfer.title: Initiate Transfer
transfer.subtitle: Fill in transfer details and select owners for approval
transfer.insufficientOwners: Please select at least {{required}} owners for confirmation (currently {{selected}} selected)
transfer.invalidAmount: Please enter a valid transfer amount
transfer.selectAtLeastOneOwner: Please select at least one owner
transfer.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

settings.label: Label
settings.whitelistLimitReached: Whitelist limit reached (10 entries). Please delete existing entries to add new ones.
settings.pleaseEnterAddress: Please enter the recipient address to add
settings.addressMustStartWith0x: Please enter an address starting with 0x. Current address does not meet requirements.
settings.invalidAddressFormat: Please enter a valid EVM address starting with 0x. Current address does not meet requirements.
settings.whitelistFullDeleteFirst: Whitelist is full. Please delete some entries to make room for new ones.
settings.userIdRequired: User ID not found. Please refresh the page.
settings.confirmUnbindEmail: Are you sure you want to change your email? The current email will be unbound and you will need to bind a new email address.
settings.unbindEmailHint: After unbinding, you can bind a new email address

footer.description: Open source project · Completely free · Continuous updates

auth.authorizeDescription: Please sign this message to authorize MultiSig Wallet Deployer to access your wallet information. This signature does not grant any transaction permissions.
